attributes.action: Make it law that all first time mothers to give birth in hospital
attributes.additional_details: Too many families are being left heartbroken and having their lives shattered all for choosing the wrong place to have their babies.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned wish for it to be made law that 1st time mums, mums with miscarriage history and mums over 35 to only give birth in a fully equipped hospital and not at home or in birthing centres.

So many babies are dying because they were not born in fully-equipped hospitals.
